Computer.name: Hacker Wars CTF StartPoint
Computer.file:
--- Capture The Flag Instructions ---
- Each team is give a set of 3 passwords. Onle one of these passwords will open the encrypted file.
- Once each encrypted file has been opened another 3 passwords will be generated; these will open the next encrypted file.
- This will happen 3 times until the player is left with 4 seperate passwords.
- To win the challenge the team must then enter all the passwords together in reply to the mission email, however this may use different passwords altogether (the final encrypted file will display instructions on this)
- Your teammates will periodically help you out by sending messages through (Terminal / MsgBoard)

Welcome to the Capture the Flag server! This is the first server you will start your journey on. Capture the Flag is largely a gamemode about guessing and speed, but also it is a test of how observent team members can be. As you proceed through each server you will find an encrypted file on each. The servers in question will each contain a password to unlock another encrypted file, until finally one team or the other team finds the final encrypted file providing them with details on a special string they must then reply to the original email with.
It is strongly advised that teams take notes about each password they find, as they may prove very useful later on...
You will find your first encrypted file at the connected nodes:
Your first set of Passwords for the encrypted file are: (without the quotation marks) - "midn1gh7" - "w3bs1te" - "h4ndsh4k3"
First team to get the correct string in reply to the email wins.
HINT: Serving Order... 103,206,097,274
